author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1579: Debug logging of messages now clips body if its too big. Added Camel property to set max length or disabled it by setting it to 0 or -1.

author: rgoers
msg: VFSFileMonitorReloadingStrategy was not able to detect files with invalid urls - see http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6351751. make HttpOutputStream and VFSURLStreamHandler private. Limit VerifiableOutputStream to package scope
